Uses of Class
entity.Location

  • Packages that use Location 
    Package Description
    ejb  
    entity  
    restful  

    • Uses of Location in ejb

      Methods in ejb that return types with arguments of type Location 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Location> LocationSSB.getAllCheckIns()
      This method provides a list of all the check-ins (locations) stored in the database, only used for testing.
      java.util.List<Location> LocationSSB.getAllLocations()
      This method provides a list of all the locations stored in the database, only used for testing.
      java.util.List<Location> LocationSSB.getUserCheckIns(java.lang.String username)
      this method returns all the check-ins of a specific user where the username of that user is passed as a parameter, a check-in is the same as a location object except for the boolean field in the location object called check-in is set to true.
      java.util.List<Location> LocationSSB.getUserLocations(java.lang.String username)
      This will return all the locations for as specific user, where the user's username is passed as a parameter.
      Methods in ejb with parameters of type Location 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean LocationSSB.addCheckIn(Location location)
      This method add a check-in to the database, the username is a field in the location object that is passed to it, a check-in is the same as a location except for the boolean field in the location object called check-in is set to true.
      boolean LocationSSB.addLocation(Location location)
      This allows us to add a location to the location table in the database.

    • Uses of Location in entity

      java.util.List<Location> AppUser.getLocations()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      setter for checkIns field
      void AppUser.setLocations(java.util.List<Location> locations)
      setter for locations field

      Get method to get a friends check-ins.

      Get method to get a friends locations.
      java.util.List<Location> RSLocation.getUserCheckInsJsonOrXML(java.lang.String username)
      Get method for getting a specific users check-ins (location)
      java.util.List<Location> RSLocation.getUserLocationsJsonOrXML(java.lang.String username)
      Get method for getting a specific users locations
      Methods in restful with parameters of type Location 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Post method to add a check-in (location) for a specific user
